name: addedlines
description: Number of lines added in this file by this commit (only in this file, not the whole commit).

name: author_bot
description: True if the given author is identified as a bot.

name: author_domain
description: Domain associated to the author in SortingHat profile.

name: author_id
description: Author Id from SortingHat.

name: author_name
description: Author name.

name: author_org_name
description: Organization name.

name: author_user_name
description: Author user name.

name: author_uuid
description: Author UUID from SortingHat.

name: committer
description: Committer name as it appears in commit (including e-mail).

name: committer_date
description: Date when committer made this commit.

name: date
description: Author date (when the original author made the commit).

name: eventtype
description: COMMIT.

name: file_dir_name
description: Path in which the file is located, not including file name.

name: file_ext
description: File extension.

name: file_name
description: File name with extension.

name: file_path_list
description: List of split path parts.

name: fileaction
description: Action performed by the commit over the file.

name: filepath
description: Complete file path.

name: files
description: Number of files touched by the same commit this file is included in.

name: filetype
description: Code or Other, based on file extension.

name: git_author_domain
description: Domain extracted from author email included within the commit, if any.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Author date (when the original author made the commit).

name: hash
description: Commit hash.

name: id
description: Commit hash.

name: message
description: Commit message split by terms.

name: message.keyword
description: Commit message as a single String.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in RAW index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated in its original data source.

name: owner
description: Owner (code author) name as it appears in commit (including e-mail).

name: perceval_uuid
description: Perceval UUID.

name: project
description: Project.

name: project_1
description: Project (if more than one level is allowed in project hierarchy).

name: removedlines
description: Number of lines removed in this file by this commit (only in this file, not the whole commit).

name: repository
description: Repository name.

name: uuid
description: Item unique identifier. Same as '_id'
